resources.string: Snake is a game where you must eat as many apples as possible. The snake increases in length with each apple that it eats, which increases the difficulty. The higher the speed, the higher the score. Choose the speed in the configuration menu. You can increase speed as time goes by if you activate the auto-speed in the configuration menu. You can play with walls (more difficult but more score) or without walls. You can activate or deactivate the walls in the configuration menu. The snake dies when it hits the wall or with itself. Move the snake by sliding your fingers across the screen in the direction you want: up, down, right or left.

Get points by fitting the geometric figures that fall on the board so that you can completely fill a row of the board. Then a line will be emptied and you will get points. You can empty several lines simultaneously, which will give you more points. When you fit a figure, another figure will automatically appear at the top of the board. The game ends when the board overflows, that is, you have consumed all the rows. The higher the level, the higher the speed and the higher the score. Choose the level in the configuration menu. You can increase the level as you fill in rows if you activate the auto-speed in the configuration menu. Move the figure by sliding your fingers across the screen either to the right or to the left. Swipe up or press the screen to rotate the figure. Slide down to accelerate the fall (when you\'re sure where you want to place it).

Try to survive as long as possible by crossing the colored ball through the obstacles, without hitting or leaving the screen. The ball will move more and more quickly. The ball will descend automatically by gravity. You must jump to raise the ball. Press the screen to jump.
Get back to the game menu
Get back to the main menu

We have to break all the blocks of the panel with the ball, which we must hit with the mobile platform. You can move the platform to the right or to the left, keeping pressing the corresponding side of the screen. The ball is in continuous movement. When hitting the mobile platform or with a block, the ball bounces. When hit with a block, it disappears and we earn points. When all the blocks disappear, we rise in level and gain a life. The higher the level, the higher the score and the faster the ball. Each time the ball bounces on the bottom of the panel, we lose a life. When we lose all lives, the game ends. You can configure the initial level in the configuration menu.
Do you want to leave the game?
The game will not be saved
How about a rating on the App Store, then?
Would you mind giving us some feedback?
What is lazy eye or amblyopia?
Filter the image with the correct colors
What happens if I suffer strabismus?
Are games also beneficial for adults?
Is it backed by a medical authority?
Are the games aimed at minors?

The vague eye or amblyopia is the most frequent reason for vision loss among children and young people in developed countries and affects approximately 3\% of the population. It happens as a result of inadequate brain processing, because one of the eyes does not communicate well with the brain (it can be due to multiple causes such as strabismus, graduation differences between both eyes, anisometropia, aniseiconía, congenital cataracts) not reaching the optimal visual acuity, nor using the best optical correction. Which causes the weaker eye to be suppressed by the stronger eye. People with lazy eye do not have a developed percepcle of depth. It is very important to correct this visual defect during childhood (before 7 or 8 years), because if it is passed, the patient can completely lose the vision of the eye that does not use.

The treatment for amblyopia is to force the lazy eye to use. The most popular is for the child to wear the 'good' eye patch for several hours every day for a few weeks or months. Once childhood is over, there is nothing to do for lack of cerebral plasticity.
However, it has been found that play is effective in the treatment of amblyopia in adults, also known as 'lazy eye ', of According to new research.
Gaming information is shared by both eyes, forcing them to cooperate.
When both eyes cooperate, the amblyopic brain can relearn as a result of an increase in the level of plasticity in the brain. Patients who played with both eyes experienced a significant improvement in their vision of the weaker eye after only two weeks.

These games can help you. With the right settings, applications can force the brain to use both eyes simultaneously to teach the brain proper image processing. Each part of the image is filtered only by one of the two eyes and this is achieved by filtering colors by putting on anaglyph glasses. Always make sure that only one of the eyes can see the left or right color. game requires that information be sent to both eyes to work cooperatively.

If you suffer from strabismus then you can NOT use this treatment because you may develop a double vision problem (diplopia). However, anyone can play games without anaglyph glasses simply for fun. You will find all the information in the "terms and conditions".

Yes, it has been discovered that these games are an effective exercise even for adults because they are based on teamwork of the eyes and force both of them to work together. In fact it is designed for adults suffering from amblyopia. Because traditional medicine only makes an early treatment until age 8 with the use of the patch, and after that age is considered impossible or very complicated. This is an alternative method for curing amblyopia for adults who feel encouraged to experiment with it.

It\'s not. It is an alternative therapy that is not supported by a professional but offers good results. First of all you must go to a professional and follow their instructions, we do not substitute the work of anyone. All this is stipulated in the \"terms and conditions\".

Yes of course. The games are suitable for all audiences in terms of gameplay and content. If you are a minor you must be under the supervision of an adult. All this is stipulated in the "terms and conditions".
What kind of 3d glasses can I use to play?
Can I change the side color filter if I prefer it?
I have normal prescription glasses, what should I do?
How long should I play the game?
How long should I play to see results?
My glasses do not filter completely in each eye
I have found an error or other unresolved doubt; or an idea to improve the experience

First go to the nut icon of the main menu or the game menu. Take the colored glasses you are going to use. Put on your glasses and select the color that corresponds to each eye. You can choose between six default colors or customize yours if you wish in the option \'Customized\'. Then you must select the side where your vague eye (Right or Left) is in the selection of the lazy eye. Finally, you have the option to activate or deactivate the sound in the games. Feel free to make all the settings you want. Even change the side of the \'Ojo vago\' if you wish. Click on the gamepad icon to go to the game menu and select the game you want and start playing.
The game works with any type of anaglyph 3D glasses.

You can change the side of the \'Eye-vague \' if you wish. The configuration of the \'lazy eye\' is designed so that with the vague eye you see the object in question that we consider \'center of attention \' and with the healthy eye the rest of the image. For example, in the Snake the vague eye will see the apple which we focus our attention on. In the Tetris the figure that we are moving. But you can do the test after playing about two weeks to see how it goes.
You must use a 3D anaglyph (if you have prescription glasses, then you should wear 3D glasses on it).

The recommended daily time can range from a minimum of 10–20 minutes to a maximum of 45–60 minutes each day. You can divide that into 2 or more sessions of 10–20 minutes if you feel more comfortable. The most important thing is to be able to concentrate on the time frame while exercising, so if you get tired rest a bit and continue later or, sometimes, you can skip a day to give your brain enough time to adapt the new entries.

At the beginning I recommend between 10 and 20 minutes per day for two weeks to evaluate the effectiveness of the treatment. Later, if it convinces you, you can increase the daily time if you notice improvements.

If you have trouble configuring the colors after reading the instructions, you probably have low contrast 3D glasses. A higher contrast (darker) lenses are easier to configure so that colors are invisible, with low contrast glasses you must choose a very bright color to achieve that. This is the reason why high contrast or darker lenses fit the game better. You can also try to customize the colors in the selection of colors in the configuration option \'Customized \'. If it still does not work, it would be advisable to use other glasses.

If you have any questions, leave us a review on the shop store page commenting your concern. Before we had a contact email, but we have seen that most of you have preferred to communicate through the reviews of the store page of the Play Store. Taking into account that the questions and answers from previous reviews can be useful, we have decided that the contact will be made in this way. You can access directly by clicking on the floating icon of the text bubble. Be as clear and concise.
Why do you need my account?
How can I change my profile data?
How can I see my activity?
Can I delete my account at any time?

With a registered account you will have a personalized profile and access to all your history of games from any device you access with your account. You will also have access to your best brands and see your progress, as well as how to share the best brands with the community. That\'s how we all encourage ourselves a little more!
In the icon of the person in the main menu you can edit your profile information.
On the clock icon. Inside you will see several general statistics. You can click on the "My History" button to see all your game history.
Press the off button on the main menu to log out.
Of course yes. At any time you can request the cancellation of the account.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

 By using the service you are accepting the terms and conditions. Please read it carefully before using AmblyoMobile. It is your responsibility to agree or disagree with these terms.


These terms are applicable to all visitors and users of the application without exception. Therefore, if you do not agree with the terms, do not use the.


The AmblyoMobile application owned by Envemos Software, applies all the terms and conditions set forth herein, and reserves the right to change the terms of this Terms and Conditions Policy at any time.


IT IS NOT CURRENTLY SUPPORTED BY ANY MEDICAL AUTHORITY. YOU MUST BE AWARE THAT YOU ARE NOT USING A MEDICAL SERVICE. ONLY IN YOU DO YOU RECOVER THE RESPONSIBILITY AND CARE OF YOUR HEALTH. BEFORE USING THE SERVICE, CONSULT WITH A PROFESSIONAL IF YOU SEE IT NECESSARY. IT IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE OR INJURY THAT MAY RESULT FROM THE USE OF THIS. ONLY AT THE USER IS THE RESPONSIBILITY ABOUT HOW AND HOW YOU ARE GOING TO USE IT. IF YOU SUFFER ANY SERIOUS HEALTH PROBLEMS, YOU MUST CALL IMMEDIATELY THE EMERGENCY SERVICES OR GO TO YOUR CORRESPONDING HEALTH CENTER. IF YOU HAVE AN EYE OR MINK PROBLEM, YOU MUST FIRST GO TO AN OPHTHALMOLOGIST, OCULIST OR PROFESSIONAL OPTOMETRIST AND FOLLOW HIS INDICATIONS.


This application is focused on an alternative treatment of amblyopia through games with the use of anaglyph glasses. However, you do not need anaglyph glasses if all you want is to play the games. Therefore, anyone can play without anaglyph glasses for mere fun without any problem, whether or not they have visual problems.


In the case of playing with the anaglyph glands, it can ONLY be done by people without visual problems or people with functional amblyopia, result of anisometropia (important difference in visual acuity between both eyes) or strabismus already corrected.


In contrast, people who suffer from uncorrected strabismus may face developing a double vision problem (diplopia). In this case, DO NOT play with anaglyph glasses while your squint is not corrected.


We emphasize it again. Visual therapy DOES NOT WORK TO HEAL THE STRATEGY. If you suffer from strabismus DO NOT USE our therapy. First you must correct your strabismus.


If the user of the application is a minor, it must be under the supervision of an adult or guardian responsible for their health and care. It is the responsibility of EVERYTHING in how much the child does in this space, including all the damages that may be caused. Otherwise, the owner is also responsible for the unsupervised use by the child, even if he / she did not know the same existence of this page.


The games are suitable for all audiences in terms of gameplay and content, and AmblyoMobile is responsible for it. If the user considers that this regulation is not complied with, he has the right to contact, through the contact email, communicating the incident.


Before any doubt, question or problem. First read the section Frequently asked questions. If this has not been resolved write to the contact email.


The contact email is envemos@gmail.com.

PRIVACY POLICY


Envemos Software built the Amblyo Mobile app as a Freemium app. This SERVICE is provided by Envemos Software at no cost and is intended for use as is.


This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.


If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.


The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at Amblyo Mobile unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.


Information Collection and Use


For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to email, username, birthday, country, gender. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.


The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.


Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app

-Google Play Services 
-Firebase Analytics 
-Sendinblue 
-AdMob


Log Data


I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.


Cookies


Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.


This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.


Service Providers


I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:


To facilitate our Service; To provide the Service on our behalf; To perform Service-related services; or To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.


I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.


Security


I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.


Links to Other Sites


This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.


Children’s Privacy


These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I will be able to do necessary actions.


Changes to This Privacy Policy


I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.


Contact Us


If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at envemos@gmail.com.

Exciting recreation of the Space Invaders where we will have to face a great wave of alien invaders. Scroll left or right by clicking on the respective arrows that will appear on the screen. To shoot you just have to click on the remaining area of the screen. If you reach an allergen, you eliminate it. If you kill all the aliens, you increase in level. In each level the surge will be more difficult and the higher the score obtained. You have a limited number of lives. You lose a life, for every enemy bullet that your ship has reached. If you lose all your lives, the game is over. When you pass level, you gain lives. The game also ends if allieliel ships reach the bottom end of the screen. In the initial levels you have a barricade to protect you from the shots.

The pong is a classic that does not disappoint anyone. In this version of the game, try to score the highest possible score for the opponent before he scores 5 points. Simply move the player\'s pad with your finger and compete with your opponent.

Pacman, our hero, munches his way around the map, eating all of the dots. However, life isn't easy for our young little hero. Along his journey, he faces spooky ghosts who will try to hurt him. Avoid them! In each corner of the map, there is a power pellet. If Pacman eats a power pellet, he is temporarily gains the power to eat enemy ghosts.
CONTROLS Up: Swipe Up
Down: Swipe Down
Left: Swipe Left
Right: Swipe Right

Your lazy eye needs to train

You can time your workouts from the application by setting a daily time limit for the application to notify you once you have exceeded it. The counter restarts every day. That way you will not have to time yourself your daily training, we do it for you! We recommend a routine of between 20–40 minutes per day about 3–4 times per week.

We will send you a notification every day so you do not forget your training routine. You will not have to remember, we\'ll do it for you! We recommend a routine of between 20–40 minutes per day about 3–4 times per week

Vector Pinball 1.6.0
© 2010-2019 Brian Nenninger
More info: www.vectorpinball.com
Comments and bug reports: brian@vectorpinball.com

Touch the screen to start a new game, launch a ball if one is not in play, and activate the flippers. Touch the score area to pause the game.

[TABLE_RULES]

Selecting the Preferences button or menu item allows you to change the following settings:
- Sound: Enables and disables sound effects
- Background Music: Enables and disabled background music
- Independent Flippers: When unchecked, any touch activates both flippers. When checked, you must touch the left side of the screen for the left flipper, and the right side for the right flipper.
- Zoom: When checked, the view will be zoomed on the ball's location during game play.
- OpenGL Rendering: Uses OpenGL to draw graphics. This improves performance on many devices, but slows down some.
- Show FPS: When checked, shows frames drawn per second in the upper left.

Vector Pinball is open source; the code is at https://github.com/dozingcat/Vector-Pinball

Thanks to Mario at www.badlogicgames.com for code improvements and libgdx.

sound, music, & audio code, by pdx
Twittering Machine
http://www.twittering.com

Table Rules:
- Light all the cyan rollovers in the top or bottom lanes to advance the score multiplier. All points you earn will be multiplied by this amount. Shooting the left ramp will also advance the multiplier.
- The game starts with ball savers in the left and right outlanes, which disappear when used. Hit all drop targets on the left or right side to restore them.
- Hitting any group of drop targets will activate the next light in the center of the field. When the large white central light is activated, shoot the left ramp to start multiball.

Table Rules:
- Light all the cyan rollovers in the bottom lanes to advance the score multiplier. All points you earn will be multiplied by this amount. 
- The game starts with ball savers in the left and right outlanes, which disappear when used. Hit all drop targets on the left or right side to restore them.
- The circles in the middle of the field keep track of how many times you've hit all the left, upper, and right drop targets. When all of them have been hit at least 3 times, shoot the red bumper in the upper right to start multiball.

Table Rules:
- Light all the cyan rollovers in the bottom lanes to advance the score multiplier. All points you earn will be multiplied by this amount. 
- The game starts with ball savers in the left and right outlanes, which disappear when used. Hit all drop targets on the left or right side to restore them.
- Shooting either ramp with turn the bumpers red, and they will change back to blue over several seconds. Hit them during this time for extra points.
- Turn the middle rings red by hitting the bumpers, and the middle sets of drop targets. When all the rings are red, shoot either ramp to start multiball.

Table Rules:
- Each bumper increases the score multiplier by 0.01x. Shooting the top drop targets or lighting all the lane rollovers will increase this amount.
- Shoot all six bumpers to light the center indicators. When all indicators for a row are lit, shoot the right hole to lock the ball for multiball.
- Multiball starts when you lock three balls. During multiball, the center indicators will light up when a ball crosses over them. Light them all to score a jackpot.
- The game starts with ball savers in the left and right outlanes, which disappear when used. Hit all drop targets on the left or right side to restore them.

Table Rules:
- The central circle has twelve points around it, 3 each of 4 colors. Shooting a top ramp will change the color of the ball and allow it to activate the points with matching color.
- When all 12 points around the circle are activated, hitting the edges of the rotating triangle will remove them. Shoot the target in the middle of the triangle to start multiball.
- During multiball, light the 12 circle points again to score a jackpot, which increases in value each time.
- The game starts with ball savers in the left and right outlanes, which disappear when used. Hit all drop targets on the left or right side to restore them.
A touch activates the flippers on the same side of the screen
No Internet connection. Please, check the internet connection
Allow us to send motivating messages and interesting information about your eye health, as well as all the news related to the functions of our apps

Your visual health is our priority. If you give us authorization, the advertising that we will show you and send you will be based on your lifestyle and the preferences you show on other platforms. (The modification may take a while to take effect.)
If you suffer astigmatism, read this

There have been several people who have asked us if this application can be used to treat strabismus. Due to your concern (and ours) about the doubts that this problem concerns, if you suffer from strabismus, please read this before using the application.


This application is designed to treat amblyopia slightly, that is, they are exercises that allow you to continue exercising the lazy eye in adults, being able to slightly correct the problem. But we start from having a healthy eye and a lazy eye. Being a problem of strabismus (in many cases triggering a problem of amblyopia due to loss of vision in one of the two eyes), the deviation of the eyes is too pronounced and in this case it can be harmful. Because this application is part of an experimental therapy, we cannot and do not have the right to be able to recommend it to people with strabismus if we cannot guarantee 100% of any adverse effects.


In the event that you suffer from a very very mild strabismus, you could assess yourself by trying it for a couple of weeks. But please, consult an opticians professional for better advice.


If in the future we know more about it, we will keep you informed.


A cordial greeting.

Note: The colors that will appear in the game will not necessarily correspond with those chosen in the settings, but with those that together with the background color the highest filtering on each lens is acquired.

Welcome to Amblyo Mobile, your new application designed to cure amblyopia while you play. We have uploaded a guide to the web so you can know the application in detail, understand its operation and know how to use it. We recommend that you read all the pages so that you have no doubt. Please DO NOT use Amblyo Mobile BEFORE all your questions have been resolved. You can always contact us if you have any questions. We hope you enjoy the application like us in developing it! A hug ;)
Session menu. Log in from here and update your profile information. So you can save your games in the cloud and synchronize them from any device through the same account.
All about the application. Online guide and contact.
Setup Menu Set the colors, the side of the lazy eye, the background color and the sound.
Log of your activity. General statistics and calendar of game history. It is necessary to log in as the data is linked to the games uploaded to the cloud from the account.
Schedule the daily time (in minutes) you want to play each day. The program will notify you once you have completed the time. The counter is reset every day.
Choose the days of the week that you want the application to notify you so as not to forget your training.
Do you want to save the game in the cloud? Log in and check all your game history.
